articles.author: Samit Sarkar
articles.title: EA Sports PGA Tour trailer teases first gameplay, platforms confirmed
articles.description: EA Sports PGA Tour has a spring 2023 release date, and Electronic Arts announced Tuesday that the golf game will be released on PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X. Check out the first trailer featuring 2015 Masters winner Jordan Spieth.
articles.content: Confirmed for PS5 and Xbox Series X and PC!
